oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Signing of the first federal financial agreement
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two men are signing papers in a notebook while three other men observe.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Assistance; Contracts; Interiors
Bissell, Alvin K.; Charpie, Robert A.; Wende, Ernest A.; Wilson Frank
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See The Oak Ridger article of December 16, 1959 for an article about the "Shirtsleeves" agreement. Front row, left to right, E. A. Wende and Al Bissell. Back row, left to right, Frank Wilson, Robert A. Charpie and an unidentified man.
Dec 1960; 1st financial assistance agreement signing; 1st City Council
